subject: Caves and Caverns
lead_paragraph: The sport of caving, formally known as spelunking, combines a broad set of disciplines ranging from mud wrestling to demolition, with a bit of rock climbing and the occasional claustrophobic swimming thrown in.
snippet: The sport of caving, formally known as spelunking, combines a broad set of disciplines ranging from mud wrestling to demolition, with a bit of rock climbing and the occasional claustrophobic swimming thrown in.
